author: roastpork
title: Unions in trouble again.
text: Quote: Originally Posted by Camelot You should take a break Mr. Pork. Newsmax is embarrassing the hell out of you. Republican deregulation of the trucking industry and the banking industry as well as Republican attacks on unions have a lot to do with the problem. From the NYT's article that Newsmax cited but politically distorted; Quote: He said the Central States fund had been hit by powerful outside forces  the deregulation of the trucking industry, declining union membership, two big stock crashes and the aging of the population  and it was currently paying out $3.46 in pension benefits to retirees for every dollar it received in employer contributions At best the deregulation is the only factor that the union can't be reasonably blamed for not anticipating. The other factors were as predicable as sunrise tomorrow.
